actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to make use of a firearm to commit a felony a Federal crime where such use violates State law, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes it a Federal crime to use a firearm to commit a felony, or to carry illegally a firearm in the commission of a felony, where such use violates State law. Prescribes a punishment of not less than one year nor more than ten years imprisonment in addition to the punishment for the felony. Provides that a violator convicted of a second or subsequent violation shall be imprisoned for not less than two years or more than twenty-five years.

titles.title: A bill to make use of a firearm to commit a felony a Federal crime where such use violates State law, and for other purposes.
